body: This addresses the last-minute discussion on DEAL_II_MPI_WITH_CUDA_SUPPORT by enabling only if mpi has the +cuda option.  According to the discussion there, at present this would work for a properly annotated openmpi, but isn't set in a standard way for the other mpi-s.
title: Make DEAL_II_MPI_WITH_CUDA_SUPPORT conditional on mpi package option.
